labels.sure-republish: Are you sure that you want to republish this question?

info.no-polling-events: Det er ikke noe avstemninger tilgjengelig
info.no-archived-events: There are no archived events currently available
info.define-group: You can define a user group for this voting event. Only users of this voting group will be able to see it.
info.question-visibility: The questions won't be visible until the question is started
info.names-available-for: Names of all participants and their votes will be available for:
info.answer-explanations: You can decide if voters will be asked to confirm their decision. You have the possibility to edit the confirmation below
info.polls-will-appear: Du vil snart se spørsmålet på skjermen.
info.polls-will-be-invisible: The questions won’t be visible untill the poll will start.
info.polls-activation-explaination: In question queue you can see the list of all the questions that have been added to the event. In order to make a question live to the users - press “Publish”. To deactivate this polling event press “Close polling event” at the top.
info.publish-poll: By pressing “Publish this question” you’ll make it visible for all the users in this question event and they can vote on it.
info.republish-poll: By pressing “Republish this question” the previous results of this question will be deleted and this question will appear for the voters to vote again.
info.close-poll: By pressing “Close this question” you’ll close this question for all voters, they won’t have possibility to vote any longer.

poll-is.non_public: Dette er en lukket votering. Deltakere er derfor skjult for deg
poll-is.anonymous: Dette er en lukket votering. Deltakere er derfor skjult for deg

info.results-will-be-visible: Thank you for participating in this poll! The results will be avaliable for the next few days on the homescreen.

result-visibility.public: Dette er en åpen votering. Ditt navn og din avgitte stemme vil være synlig for alle som deltar
result-visibility.non_public: Dette er en lukket votering. Ditt navn og avgitte stemme vil kun vises for administrator
result-visibility.anonymous: Dette er en anonym votering. Ditt navn og avgitte stemme vil ikke være synlig for noen

info.not-you: Ikke deg? Vennligst, logg inn på nytt

tooltips.poll-public: Participants and administrators will see who voted for what
tooltips.poll-non-public: Only administrators will see who voted for what
tooltips.poll-anonymous: No one will see who voted for what
tooltips.publish-poll: Participants will see the question, can vote and see the results
tooltips.close-poll: Participant won't see the question or the results

info.select-option: Velg et alternativ for å se hvem som stemte på det

descriptions.home: Siden der din stemme blir hørt

explanations.disagree: No, I disagree with the question
explanations.agree: Yes, I agree with the question
